translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 崖の上から、それを見ているエレナと盗賊団
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Elena and the bandits watching from the top of the cliff

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 設定　エレナ、あの後、また別の呪いのアイテムで同様の状況になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Setting: After that, Elena was again put into a similar situation by another cursed item.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いの装備品は原画に任せていますが、まだ出来ていなかったら作ってくれていいです
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The cursed equipment is left to the original artist, but if it isn't done yet, feel free to create it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山賊団の名前や規模、設定も任せます
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The name, scale, and setting of the bandit group are also up to you.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 人類が滅亡の危機、関係ないねー、今こそ山賊が暴れる大チャンスだ、ひゃっほー
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Humanity faces extinction, but who cares? Now is the perfect chance for bandits to run wild, yahoo!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 北斗の拳の無法者達のイメージ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Inspired by the image of the lawless bandits from 'Fist of the North Star'.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 襲ってきました
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They attacked.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エレナと山賊団を倒し、エレナを捕まえます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Defeat Elena and the bandits, then capture Elena.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ呪いの効果があり暴れん坊です
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The curse's effect remains, and she's still unruly.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いの効果を解くにはもう一つの処女を奪う必要がある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: To break the curse, another virgin must be taken.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、やろうかと思うが・・今は戦いの最中、エレナの力は有用
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I was thinking of doing it... but we're in the middle of a battle, and Elena's power is useful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しばらくはこのまま部下にした方がよいかもとも思う
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Maybe it's better to keep her as a subordinate like this for a while.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞選択
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Choice

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　エレナの呪いを解く
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Break Elena's curse

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ＞　そのままのエレナを部下にする
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: > Keep Elena as she is as a subordinate

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エレナとエッチします
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Have sex with Elena.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: エレナは前回ランスとした後、やっていません。山賊団の連中は信者なので
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Elena hasn't done it since last time with Rance. The bandits are her followers.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: アナルなのでシィルに準備させます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since it's anal, have Ciel prepare her.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 浣腸されて屈辱で怒り狂う、シィル命令なのでしかたなくしているが申し訳無い気持ち
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She is humiliated and furious from the enema; she does it reluctantly because of Ciel's orders and feels sorry.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様のチンコにうんこがついたら嫌だからな、がははは
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't want shit on my dick, haha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: てな感じでやります。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's the plan.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 場所：青姦、空が見える山の尾根、景色が良い、高原植物
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Location: Outdoor sex, on a mountain ridge with a view of the sky, nice scenery, alpine plants.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 縛るではなく、シィルに押さえつけされる
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Instead of being tied up, she is restrained by Ciel.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: シィルの腕力ではエレナを抑えるのは無理だろうから、魔法粘着地面とか併用なイメージかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ciel's strength alone can't hold Elena down, so imagine using magical sticky ground or something alongside.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスにアナルに突っ込まれます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance penetrates her anus.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ギリギリ・・痛い、と泣く、今回は気持ちよくではなく血も出て痛がるだけでもいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Barely... it hurts, she cries. This time, it's not pleasure, just pain and bleeding might be fine.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 呪いが解けて元の性格に戻ったエレナ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Elena, whose curse is lifted, returns to her original personality.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 泣く、私もうお嫁にいけません、山賊となって人を殺めたり、処女を失い、さらに
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: She cries, 'I can no longer get married; I became a bandit, killed people, lost my virginity, and more...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こんなおしりまで・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Even this butt...'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうか、そうか、なら俺の元で働け。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I see, I see. Then work under me.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: と嫌がるエレナを無理矢理ひっぱって連れていきます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I forcibly pull the reluctant Elena and take her along.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランスを好きになるタイプでなく、気が弱いのでなすがままという感じがいいかな
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Not the type to like Rance; she is weak-willed and obedient, which might be better.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 俺様は今世界を救う戦いをしている仲間になれ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Become my comrade in the battle to save the world.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 救う？そんなの興味ない、私は殺れればいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Save? I'm not interested in that, I just want to kill.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そうだな、同感だ、俺も犯れればいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Yeah, I feel the same. I'd be fine as long as I can rape.'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ここでチビチビと待ち構えて輸送団を襲っていてもつまらんぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It's boring to just wait around here and attack the transport groups little by little.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物の軍団は数万、数百万いる、それをぶっ殺す。そっちの方がよくないか
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: There are tens or hundreds of thousands of monsters; let's kill them all. Isn't that better?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ・・・うん、そっちがいい
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: ...Yeah, that's better.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 姉御ー　そんなの危険だよ、俺達と一緒にここで・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Boss, that's dangerous! Stay here with us...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ああ、そうだな、私はあいつらを見捨ててはおけない、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Yeah, that's right. I can't abandon those guys.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: じゃ、あいつらも一緒でいいぞ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Then, it's fine if they come along too.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: よし、のった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Alright, I'm on board.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: こうして、エレナは魔物退治に参加する事になった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: And so, Elena decided to join the monster hunting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: （ランス・・　ま、やりたくなったら呪いを解いてエッチするとしよう）
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: (Rance... well, if I feel like it, I'll break the curse and have sex.)

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 山賊団の件が終わった、さて、また食料運搬の護衛の続きだ。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The bandit matter ended; now, back to escorting the food transport.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 南の前線に向かいます。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Heading towards the southern front line.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 軽く誰かと会話・・
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Briefly chatting with someone...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 南部の町に到着した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Arrived at a southern town.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 輸送隊がくると、みんな食料に群がった。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When the transport arrived, everyone swarmed for the food.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この町の防衛隊長は汎用キャラでそれっぽく作って
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The town's defense captain is a generic character, designed to fit the role.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ユーザーに伝える部分
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This conveys information to the user.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一般的な防衛隊、一所懸命戦っているが、魔人には勝てない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A typical defense unit fighting hard but cannot defeat the demons.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一度は挑むが勝てない事が分かった後、彼らから
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: After trying once and realizing they cannot win, they were told...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 命か食料か選べと言われたら、従うしかない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: 'Choose between life or food,' they were told, leaving them no choice but to obey.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 町中に食料を奪われて、みんな飢えている。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: With the food taken throughout the town, everyone is starving.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: もう３日も水しか飲んでいないとかそんな状況
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The situation is so dire that they've only had water for three days.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 飢え死にするくらいなら戦って死ねばいいのにと言われると
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: When told, 'If you're going to starve to death, you might as well die fighting,'

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 努力していや１％でも可能性があるなら死にものぐるいでやるさ
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We will struggle with all our might if there is even a 1% chance.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: だが、魔人に我々は勝てない、それに逃げ遅れた市民を守られねばいけない
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But we cannot defeat demons, and we must protect citizens who couldn't escape.
